title: Pico
desc: The leader of a gang of hitmen and assassins. After his break-up with BF and the supposed death of Cassandra, he decided to go off-radar and make a living out of the only thing he knows how to do right: killing. However he doesn't take social cues very well, often attempting to reconcile with BF, who wants to be left alone.

cData.desc: Old Pico Menu Art by squishyzumorizu
